through the days and nights day and night
i dont worry cause

can get in the way of what im feeling they cant

were the best
me and you together

you and me together us together

i dont worry cause
everythings gonna be alright everythings gonna be alright
people keep talking make them talk

can get in the way of what i feel

so till the end of time im telling you there is no one

no one no one no one
can get in the way of what im feeling
